parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description: The database engine. Set the value to **mongodb**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Role
parameters.description:
The role of the instance. Valid values:

- db: the shard role of a sharded cluster instance.

- cs: the config server role of a sharded cluster instance.

- mongos: the mongos role of a sharded cluster instance.

- normal: the role of a replica set instance.

- physical: the role of a single node instance.

The default value is normal.
